channel.title: A few questions
channel.description:
ok this is my first server and im a bit stuck so if any1 can help me i will be very greatful
1. why cant other people log into my server? 2. how do i change the shop background? 3. how do i move "home" do i have to delete all the shops and remake in new locations? 4. how do i take ::pure and ::defence off the commands? 5. how do i change the client so when people log on it says gimpscape instead of something else, and is there a website to make one? 6. how do i stop people teleporting out of "jail"? 7. sometimes when i try trading with npc's i get a message saying suspicous activity and it dont let me log out how can i get rid of that? 8. how do i get the proper godsword stance? 9. when i log in it teleports me to jail where do i change that? 10. when you kill a monster you cant pick anything up :/ any1 know what to do??
please help me
thanks

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @sjoukjeowns sjoukjeowns
item.description:
@sjoukjeowns wrote:

  1. why cant other people log into my server? go to start typ in cmd open as admin type ipconfig and default ip put in your internet load page login and go portforward http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html use that quide

  2. how do i change the shop background? just in your server files!

  3. how do i move “home” do i have to delete all the shops and remake in new locations? in player.java is when u just start in client.java there is prob a ::home command make it your coordinates and your done

  4. how do i take ::pure and ::defence off the commands? explain? delete or add? search them in client.java and delete it
    if t/m the brick } you could also change the rights like
    if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”)&& playerRights >= 2){ //2 is admin 0 is for everyone 3 owner

  5. how do i change the client so when people log on it says gimpscape instead of something else, and is there a website to make one? search in client.java for “gimpscape” do that with more things like ::commands all just search them use CTRL+F!!

  6. how do i stop people teleporting out of “jail”? code it make it so they can’t tele out(dunno)

  7. sometimes when i try trading with npc’s i get a message saying suspicous activity and it dont let me log out how can i get rid of that? search in shops.java or client.java and delete whole shop or fix it

  8. how do i get the proper godsword stance? use someone else (lol) dunno

  9. when i log in it teleports me to jail where do i change that? search it in client.java CTRL+f

  10. when you kill a monster you cant pick anything up any1 know what to do?? i don’t know but if it’s on a object u can’t never take it so make sure the npc isn’t spawned on a object!

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @samskswanch samskswanch
item.description:
@samskswanch wrote:

  1. you have to port forward
    2.login back ground for client is i sprites
    3.moving home teleport like::home. just search the cords in client.java and change to where you wish you want them to be.
  2. find the code and delete. make backup client.java just incase
  3. explain more.
    6.idk my server doesnt even have jail on it
    7.never had that problem ever
  4. there a TuT in tutorials
  5. once again search your cords in java then change to where you wish
    10.another problem ive never incounterd

hope this helped you a little bit

item.description:

  1. why cant other people log into my server?
  2. how do i change the shop background?
  3. how do i move “home” do i have to delete all the shops and remake in new locations?
